MEINCK
v.
CITY OF GASTONIA 130PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2017 Thomas D. Bumgardner, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Meinck, Joan A. Martha Raymond Thompson, Attorney at Law, Gastonia, Ryan L. Bostic, Attorney at Law, Aaron C. Low, Attorney at Law, Gastonia, for City of Gastonia. Andrew J. Santaniello, Attorney at Law, Kimberly S. Hibbard, General Counsel, Gregory F. Schwitzgebel, III, Associate General Counsel, for N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of August 2017 by N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys and the N.C. League of Municipalities for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2017."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within *726the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
